| Property       | Attribute       | Description | Type     | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |

| `buttonText`   | `button-text`   |             | `string` | `'默认文字'`    |
| `buttonType`   | `button-type`   |             | `string` | `'default'` |
